name: 林丁丙
objective:
1.基礎傳輸線理論
2.耦合
3.非理想的傳輸線效應
4.構裝、連接器與穿接腳
5.電源供應系統
6.電子電路的模擬
schedule:
1 weeks The Importance of Interconnect Design
1 week Ideal Transmission Line Fundamentals
2 week Crosstalk
2 week Nonideal Interconnect Issues
3 weeks Connectors, Packages, and Vias
2 weeks Retrun Paths,Simultaneous Switching Noise,and Power Delivery
2 Weeks Buffer Modeling
2 Weeks Digital Timing Analysis
materials: S, H. Hall, G. W. Hall and J. A. McCall, High-Speed Digital System Design, Wiley Inter-Science.
